reviewText:
I have this one and used it many years ago and got awesome thighs and butt!  Really! Of course I also did step aerobics and other aerobic activity and ate good.  I love this one because it is different from the ones I do now.  Now days I do heavy lifting and squats and lunges. Well now since I had let myself go for a bit I gained some weight and even though the heavy weights with running and step will work I have a knee problem now! So this would be perfect to help out I really want to use this tape again.  However I do not have a VHS player.  So went looking for this one in particular because I remember it was leg lifts and bridges and u use ankle weights.

That would be better for me right now with walking and step till I can jog and step the weight off again. I can't find it on DVD!! I don't even know how to convert it to the DVD! I looked online but there is no CVS near me that converts anymore and I saw I can ship it off but I don't want to send it away.  So I looked up a machine to do it, but I heard it won't record the ones that are copy write! Ugh I paid for the darn thing already I should be able to copy it!!
The best and most sensual footage from 90s models Tamara Lee, Kylie Rose, and Becky LeBeau!

I love this video and want to get a similar one for upper body.  It is a real workout but does what she claims.  I'm 68 and like the firmer me.  Go at your own place as she instructs and it will give you better health and well-being in time.  No need to overdue.

The bruenette on the cover has one real nice scene where she seems even more leggy than the rest & she does have nice breasts.  There isn't enough good footage of her.  Becky is just lacking so overall, not worth too much.  I'm between 2 & 3 stars really.

This is my all time favorite thigh and butt workout video!!  I stumbled upon this tape at an exceptionally low price so I wasn't too concerned if it wound up with the other unused workout tapes.  Much to my surprise it went above and beyond my expectations.
The tape is set in a ballet type studio, the instructor has a pleasant voice and demeanor(unlike many screechy voiced instructors who I can only manage to listen to once before tossing it in the "never again to be played" pile), she gives great direction without all the hoopla.  Very effective!  No whiners allowed with this tape..the instructor has you doing sets of 50 at a time.  Don't let that scare you though, she does it in a way, so that by the time you are done with the tape you have done a total of 200 reps and don't know how or when you got through them all.
Great choreography, style and music.  Do this tape for two weeks and you will see major results.
I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS TAPE!!!  I wish I could find the rest of her series.

Vignettes of three, all natural, beautiful girls, posing in various stages of undress.  Very well shot with high production quality.  Featuring the ever tan-lined, curvaceous (38D, 24, 36), blonde bombshell of B-movies, music videos, Playboy layouts, and Pay Per View TV from the late 1980's and the 1990's, Becky Lebeau.  This is the third of the Soft Bodies Video Series and might be considered tame by today's standards, but still has lots of sex appeal.  Also features popular model of the day, Julia Hayes.
